01TRADE SERVICES

Your First Step to Worry-Free Trading!

Leave your international trading worries to us. With ERC Abay-abay Customs Brokerage, you can focus on more important business needs. Let us do the work and make things simple for you.

Talk to an expert today!

What we can do for you:

  • Tariff Classification and Consultation
  • Custom Clearance
  • Preparation and Filing of Import and Export Documents
  • Domestic and International Shipping
  • Customs Duties Computation
  • Transportation Regulations
  • Storage and Distribution
  • Warehousing

If you would like to contact us and discuss the import and cargo services we can offer, please feel free to write, call or fax us with any questions or concerns you may have.
